content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
old stone bridge

# Target Sentence
They crossed the old stone bridge at dusk

# Context
Fog drifted along the river. <sentence>They crossed the <fragment>old stone bridge</fragment> at dusk</sentence> Lanterns were just being lit in the town.
{"translation":"古い石橋","sentence_translation":"彼らは夕暮れに古い石橋を渡った"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
quiet resolve

# Target Sentence
Her eyes showed a quiet resolve after hearing the news

# Context
The announcement surprised everyone. <sentence>Her eyes showed a <fragment>quiet resolve</fragment> after hearing the news</sentence> She stood still, taking a deep breath.
{"translation":"静かな決意","sentence_translation":"その知らせを聞いた後、彼女の目には静かな決意が宿っていた"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
rustling leaves

# Target Sentence
The sound of rustling leaves filled the narrow path

# Context
Autumn winds blew through the forest. <sentence>The sound of <fragment>rustling leaves</fragment> filled the narrow path</sentence> The path was covered in red and gold.
{"translation":"葉擦れの音","sentence_translation":"細い道には葉擦れの音が満ちていた"}
